languages.text: "Я желаю быть полезен Вашей Светлости, но то, зачем вы пришли... Это поставит под удар корабль. Такой ритуал может пойти — и обязательно пойдет — по худшему сценарию".

traits.locale_text: "Я желаю быть полезен Вашей Светлости, но то, зачем вы пришли... Это поставит под удар корабль. Такой ритуал может пойти — и обязательно пойдет — по худшему сценарию".

languages.text: "It is my wish to be useful to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but what you have come for... will put the ship in peril. A ritual of this kind can — and certainly will — go the worst way possible."
languages.original_text: "Я желаю быть полезен Вашей Светлости, но то, зачем вы пришли... Это поставит под удар корабль. Такой ритуал может пойти — и обязательно пойдет — по худшему сценарию".

traits.locale_text: "It is my wish to be useful to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but what you have come for... will put the ship in peril. A ritual of this kind can — and certainly will — go the worst way possible."
"It is my wish to be useful to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but what you have come for... will put the ship in peril. A ritual of this kind can — and certainly will — go the worst way possible."
"It is my wish to be useful to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but what you have come for... will put the ship in peril. A ritual of this kind can — and certainly will — go the worst way possible."
"It is my wish to be useful to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but what you have come for... will put the ship in peril. A ritual of this kind can — and certainly will — go the worst way possible."
"It is my wish to be useful to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but what you have come for... will put the ship in peril. A ritual of this kind can — and certainly will — go the worst way possible."
"It is my wish to be useful to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but what you have come for... will put the ship in peril. A ritual of this kind can — and certainly will — go the worst way possible."

languages.text: «Deseo ser de utilidad a mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero lo que pide... pondrá en peligro a toda la nave. Un ritual de esta clase puede acabar de la peor forma posible, y lo más seguro es que así sea».
languages.original_text: "It is my wish to be useful to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but what you have come for... will put the ship in peril. A ritual of this kind can — and certainly will — go the worst way possible."

traits.locale_text: «Deseo ser de utilidad a mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero lo que pide... pondrá en peligro a toda la nave. Un ritual de esta clase puede acabar de la peor forma posible, y lo más seguro es que así sea».

languages.text: 「陛下のお役に立ちたい気持ちはあるが、あなた方のしようとしていることは…この船を危険に晒す。こういった儀式は、きっと…いや確実に、最悪の事態を招きかねない」
languages.original_text: "It is my wish to be useful to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but what you have come for... will put the ship in peril. A ritual of this kind can — and certainly will — go the worst way possible."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下のお役に立ちたい気持ちはあるが、あなた方のしようとしていることは…この船を危険に晒す。こういった儀式は、きっと…いや確実に、最悪の事態を招きかねない」

languages.text: “我愿意帮您的忙，大人，但您渴望实现的目的……会将这艘船置于灾难之中。这样的仪式可能会，不，肯定会让所有的一切都走向最糟糕的方向。”
languages.original_text: "It is my wish to be useful to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but what you have come for... will put the ship in peril. A ritual of this kind can — and certainly will — go the worst way possible."

traits.locale_text: “我愿意帮您的忙，大人，但您渴望实现的目的……会将这艘船置于灾难之中。这样的仪式可能会，不，肯定会让所有的一切都走向最糟糕的方向。”

languages.text: "Es ist mein Wunsch, Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} nützlich zu sein, doch was Ihr von mir fordert ... würde das Schiff in Gefahr bringen. Ein solches Ritual kann — und wird mit großer Wahrscheinlichkeit — vollkommen schiefgehen."
languages.original_text: "It is my wish to be useful to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but what you have come for... will put the ship in peril. A ritual of this kind can — and certainly will — go the worst way possible."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist mein Wunsch, Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} nützlich zu sein, doch was Ihr von mir fordert ... würde das Schiff in Gefahr birngen. Ein solches Ritual kann — und wird mit großer Wahrscheinlichkeit — vollkommen schiefgehen."

languages.text: « Je ne demande qu'à vous être utile, Votre Seigneurie, mais ce que vous attendez de moi... compromettrait la sécurité de l'ensemble du vaisseau. Un rituel de ce genre a toutes les chances de tourner à la catastrophe. »
languages.original_text: "It is my wish to be useful to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but what you have come for... will put the ship in peril. A ritual of this kind can — and certainly will — go the worst way possible."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne demande qu'à vous être utile, Votre Seigneurie, mais ce que vous attendez de moi... compromettrait la sécurité de l'ensemble du vaisseau. Un rituel de ce genre a toutes les chances de tourner à la catastrophe. »

languages.text: "İsteğim, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne faydalı olmaktır fakat buraya gelme nedeniniz... Gemiyi tehlikeye atacaktır. Bu tür bir ayin, olabilecek en kötü şekilde sonlanabilir ki böyle sonlanacağı muhakkak."
languages.original_text: "It is my wish to be useful to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but what you have come for... will put the ship in peril. A ritual of this kind can — and certainly will — go the worst way possible."
